LOGIN_CARD.HEADLINE: Personal Dashboard
LOGIN_CARD.PGPH1: The Personal Dashboard is only accessible for registered customers. Please log in or register to access your personal dashboard with exclusive insights and exciting features guiding you to your new Mercedes-Benz.

REGISTRATION_CARD.HEADLINE: Personal Dashboard - No registration yet
REGISTRATION_CARD.PGPH1: Interested in receiving news on our upcoming Mercedes-Benz cars?
REGISTRATION_CARD.PGPH2: Then register here and benefit from exclusive updates.
REGISTRATION_CARD.TEASER: Choose your model and start the corresponding registration process
REGISTRATION_CARD.LABEL: Mercedes-Benz {{model}}

ERROR.HEADLINE: We're sorry something went wrong.
ERROR.PGPH1: Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again later.

ACTIVITY.HEADLINE: Start your journey towards the EQC
ACTIVITY.TEXT: Enhance your personal EQ experience by clicking on one of the actions below.

OPEN.HEADLINE: Next Steps
OPEN.TEXT: Check the EQ Insights dashboard regularly for updates and new features.

POST.HEADLINE: Dealer Selector
POST.TEXT: You have selected the following Mercedes-Benz EQ Agent.
Thank you for reserving an {{model}}. We are delighted that you have chosen Mercedes-Benz first all-electric vehicle. Your selected Agent will be in contact with you shortly.

INTERESTED.TEXT1: Thank you for your interest in booking a Test Drive with the first all-electric Mercedes-Benz, the EQC. Please give us a moment to process your request. Your Test Drive confirmation will be ready soon. We hope you are just as excited as we are.
INTERESTED.TEXT2: Your Test Drive data will be updated shortly.

BOOKED.TEXT1: The EQC. Electric tested on ice. Electric tested in the desert. Now it is your turn.
BOOKED.TEXT2: In {{days}} days the EQC will be ready for you.

FINISHED.TEXT1: We hope the Mercedes Benz EQC has also passed its test and exceeded your expectations. Please do share any feedback on your experience below.

POST.HEADLINE: Configuration Online Code
POST.TEXT: Thank you for configuring your ideal EQC. Your Online Code that relate to your current configuration is {{onlineCode}}. This code remains active for 30 days after the last change.

POST.QUESTION: When will you be looking for your new EQC?

DEALER.ERROR: There are missing inputs to save your preferred dealer. Please check the error messages above.

LOCATOR.HEADLINE: Select your preferred Mercedes-Benz EQ Agent
LOCATOR.SUBHEADLINE: Based on the address you provided during registration, we have found the following Mercedes-Benz EQ Agents near you. Please select your preferred Agent from this list or enter a new postcode to search for other Mercedes-Benz EQ Agents.
LOCATOR.ERROR: Please select your preferred Agent from the list.

VALIDATION.MESSAGE: Please enter a valid postcode or city.

INPUT.ERROR: 0 Agents were found. Please enter a valid postcode or city.

LOCATOR.FOOTNOTE: *Please note that only authorised Mercedes-Benz EQ Agents are displayed in this list.

USAGE.HEADLINE: Usage of vehicle
USAGE.PARAGRAPH: We would love to know how you intend to use the Mercedes-Benz EQC, so that we can provide you with optimum support in a potential future purchase.

BUSINESS.LABEL: Business vehicle*
BUSINESS.ERROR: The company name can't be empty or have the following characters: '<>;!'

USAGE.ERROR: Please choose the purpose of the Mercedes-Benz EQC.

DECLARATION.HEADLINE: PRIVACY INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT
DECLARATION.PGPH1:
Privacy

Your personal information is being collected by Mercedes-Benz Australia/Pacific Pty Ltd (ABN 23 004 411 410) 44 Lexia Place, Mulgrave, Victoria 3170. (a member of the Daimler Group).

We value your privacy and we collect your personal information by lawful means in accordance with the Australian Privacy Principles (“APPs”) and our Privacy Policy.


Future Communications

By way of this online form, MBAuP is collecting your personal information for the primary purpose of responding to your enquiry. Without this information MBAuP may not be able to address your enquiry. In addition to this, if you consented to receiving marketing material from us, you will receive marketing material in the manner you specified. If you are an existing customer and record your preferences within this form, it will not be updated in our system. Existing customers can change their preferences at any time by logging onto Owners Online. MBAuP will generally use and disclose your personal information to its employees, related companies and Daimler Group companies, our authorised dealer network and/or third party service providers acting on our behalf. Some of the recipients of your personal information may be based overseas, including but not limited to Germany, the United States and Singapore.

Our Privacy Policy contains information about how you can access the personal information that we hold about you and how you can seek to correct it.

Our Privacy Policy also contains information about how you may complain if you believe that we have breached the APPs and how we deal with complaints. If you would like to know more about our privacy policy please click here.

CHANNELS.PGPH1: In accordance with the privacy collection statement, I agree to be contacted for direct marketing by:

ACCORDION.HEADLINE: Additional Information regarding our privacy statement and your rights:

SIGNATURE.LABEL: I confirm that I have read and I accept the privacy information collection statement.
SIGNATURE.ERROR: Please confirm that you have read and accept the declaration of consent.
